page.title: 02OCCUPATIONS
page.content: We sent out questionnaires to parents of children at our school and from the replies we found the following percentages.Of those replying 64% were male and 36% female. We found 30% were unemployed, 13% men and 17% women.The job of looking after the home was done exclusively by 15% of women and 2% of men. { TYPES OF WORK Manufacturing 16% Extractive industries 16% Public employment 10% Self employed 10% service industries 8% Clerical and office work 5% Others 5% { PLACE OF WORK Of those employed 25% worked in Mansfield Woodhouse and 32% in the rest of Nottinghamshire. { TIME IN PRESENT JOB 1 Year 16% 1 to 10 59% Over 10 59% {72% enjoyed}their work.{Class 7 S.E.
